articles.author: Agencies
articles.title: WHO: Monkeypox cases rise to over 6,000; to call 2nd emergency meet - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: LONDON: More than 6,000 cases of monkeypox have now been reported from 58 countries in the current outbreak, the WHO has said.

articles.author: Agencies
articles.title: Brent crude falls below $100 for first time since late April - Economic Times
articles.description: Europe's benchmark crude contract, Brent North Sea, dropped 3.3 percent to $99.39 per barrel in mid-afternoon deals, while US counterpart WTI oil also fell 3.3 percent to stand at $96.12.
articles.content: London-World oil prices spiralled lower Wednesday on fears that a potential recession will slash demand, with Brent crude sinking under $100 per barrel for the first time since April 25th as recessio… [+771 chars]

articles.title: Earth orbit, Moon, Mars: ESA's ambitious roadmap - Phys.org
